Services

We are a group of Designer, Architects and Analysis who share the goal of change the industry.

At PPL we offer a range of services all championing ethical construction and environments. We offer both architectural services and ethical consultants, in the form of desktop applications and project consultants.

Design

Our in-house design team at PPL are committed to designing and delivering project that are ethical from cradle to grave. With the use of Evelina our design departments are have a strong understanding of what good design for the building user.

Evelina Index

Evalina Index is an algorithmic evaluation system which can output a score based on basic building material details and on-site construction processes. The index is unlike many other metrics as the embodied energy of material extraction and construction process is considered within the rating.

Evelina Post Occupancy

At PPL we believe that POE should not be completed within limited time allocations and conducted in a manner where people are forced into giving their opinion on topic matters. Therefore, we want to utilise the vast amount of online social media data to conduct continues desktop POE studies, Evelina PO allows us to achieve this, using artificial intelligence and natural language processing. Evelina can give a detailed overview of what public perception is about any building.

Education

With the ambition of becoming market leaders in ethical considerations, we will become a trusted source of education and information. We will achieve this by hosting regular seminars/ workshops, a handbook, and ensuring all parties sign a fair practice contract; which adheres to these values.

Interested in one of our services?

Whether you have a question about our work or have an upcoming project. Our team is ready to answer all your questions!
